name: raycast-rsync-extension
title: Rsync File Transfer
description: Transfer files between local and remote servers using rsync with SSH config integration
author: dytsou

commands.name: upload
commands.title: Upload Files Via Rsync
commands.description: Upload local files to a remote server using rsync

commands.name: download
commands.title: Download Files Via Rsync
commands.description: Download files from a remote server using rsync

commands.name: browse
commands.title: Browse Remote Files
commands.description: Browse and list files on a remote server

preferences.name: rsyncHumanReadable
preferences.title: Human-readable file sizes
preferences.label: Human-readable file sizes (-h)
preferences.description: Display file sizes in KB, MB, GB format

preferences.name: rsyncProgress
preferences.title: Show progress
preferences.label: Show progress (-P)
preferences.description: Show transfer progress and support partial transfers

preferences.name: rsyncDelete
preferences.title: Delete extraneous files
preferences.label: Delete extraneous files (--delete)
preferences.description: Delete files in destination that don't exist in source (use with caution)
